definition: to be dedicated to one's work/to respect one's work
to salute/to pay one's respects to/to pay tribute to/to pay homage to
home of respect for aged/nursing home
Guo Jingming (1983-), Chinese young-adult fiction writer and teen pop idol
to show filial respect/to give presents (to one's elders or superiors)/to support one's aged parents
to return a compliment/to give sth in return

sentences.english: Yea, thou castest off fear, and restrainest prayer before God.
sentences.chinese: 你是廢棄敬畏的意，在神面前阻止敬虔的心。

sentences.english: We offered them each three cups of barley wine.
sentences.chinese: 我們敬了他們每人三杯青稞酒。

sentences.english: A holiday wish from your son Tom.
sentences.chinese: 寄上佳節的祝願，你們的女子湯姆敬上。

sentences.english: An homage to the Mufasa death scene?
sentences.chinese: 向穆法沙的死亡場景緻敬？

sentences.english: Godliness add the content heart is the big interests.
sentences.chinese: 敬虔加上知足的心便是大利了。

sentences.english: They may have a form of godliness, but they deny its power.
sentences.chinese: 他們有一種敬，但他們否認它的力量。

sentences.english: You sneak a flask up there and raise a toast to the whole city of New York.
sentences.chinese: 在樓上偷偷拿走一個扁酒瓶，向整個紐約城敬上一杯。

sentences.english: On the day of the birth of his first child, he was giving cigars away to all and sundry.
sentences.chinese: 他第一個孩子出生的那天，他向所有的人都敬雪茄煙。

sentences.english: First generation serious Christians faded in later generations.
sentences.chinese: 第一代敬虔的基督徒在後來幾代中逐漸消失。

sentences.english: There is a road to Xiangan king, eight porridge for There is no end for learning.
sentences.chinese: 書山有路先乾爲敬，學海無涯八寶作粥。

sentences.english: Let me offer you a glass of Adam's ale.
sentences.chinese: 讓我以水代酒，敬你一杯。

sentences.english: The art for Qiu Qijing, has been a kind of cultivation, together with light and dust.
sentences.chinese: 藝術之於邱啓敬，已經成爲一種修行，和光同塵。

sentences.english: In the UK, traditional valedictions have been mainly replaced by "Yours sincerely" or "Yours faithfully".
sentences.chinese: 在英國，傳統告別被“敬上”主要替換了或“敬上”。

sentences.english: In the UK, traditional valedictions have been mainly replaced by "Yours sincerely" or "Yours faithfully".
sentences.chinese: 在英國，傳統告別被“敬上”主要替換了或“敬上”。

sentences.english: Will this new program attract skilled personnel to our company?
sentences.chinese: 這個新項目將能吸引有技術的全體人員到我們共司敬？

sentences.english: If we feed our parents but don't respect them, how is this different from raising cats or dogs?
sentences.chinese: 如果光養而不知敬，那和養貓養狗又有何區別？

definition: yours truly/yours sincerely (at the end of a letter)
to toast sb (with wine etc)/to drink a toast
surname Li/abbr. for 禮記|礼记[Li3 ji4], Classic of Rites
to drink a toast/Cheers! (proposing a toast)/Here's to you!/Bottoms up!/lit. dry cup
to drain the cup in one gulp (idiom)
to return a politeness/to present a gift in return
dilute wine/insipid wine/I'm sorry the wine I offer you is so poor (humble)
